name: Answer Style - Detailed Responses
description: Test knowledge extraction from detailed, specific answers
inputs: I want to evaluate my data science skills
I have 3 years of professional experience working with Python pandas, numpy, and scikit-learn. I've built production ML models for customer churn prediction achieving 87% accuracy.
For visualization I use matplotlib and seaborn daily, and I've created executive dashboards in Tableau that are used by C-level stakeholders.
I'm proficient in SQL - I write complex queries with CTEs, window functions, and optimize for performance. I work with PostgreSQL and BigQuery.
I've completed Coursera's Deep Learning specialization and I'm currently studying for the AWS ML Specialty certification.
